mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO cart_mer_tb ( number, total_price, create_date, update_date, spread_account_id, mer_id, account_id ) VALUES ( #{number}, #{totalPrice}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{spreadAccountId}, #{merId}, #{accountId} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE cart_mer_tb
number=#{number},
total_price=#{totalPrice},
create_date=#{createDate},
update_date=#{updateDate},
spread_account_id=#{spreadAccountId},
mer_id=#{merId},
account_id=#{accountId},
WHERE cart_mer_id=#{cartMerId}
mapper.select: SELECT cart_mer_id, number, total_price, create_date, update_date, spread_account_id, mer_id, account_id FROM cart_mer_tb WHERE cart_mer_id=#{cartMerId}
